title: I have 130 chaos tokens rito pl0x
body:
I've been saving for an orb throughout the whole event and now I log in to the event being over... Please Riot, don't leave me hanging, gimme those last 10 tokens. 
Thanks :)
Yours truly
Goddess of the Sun, Amaterasu

replies.body: I don't know if one of you has seen this, but I just got a 10 token mission, and praise be upon thee, rito
Weeeeeiiiiiiird......those missions should have ended on 6/29. It might have been some sort of visual bug, still pretty strange, but hey whatever gets you the icon eh? xD
